item.description:
Open Doors Manchester Arts and Cultural Tour
Thursday, July 22, 2010
5:00 p.m.-8:00 p.m.
FREE Admission

This is the best way to get to know the city's brilliant and richly varied cultural landscape! Hop on the trolley and visit the Millyard Museum and much more, including Art 3 Gallery, Langer Place, Manchester Artists Association Gallery, SEE Science Center, Art on the Wall at City Hall, Framers Market, and the Studio of Photographic Arts (SOPHA). Gift certificates for great Manchester restaurants will be raffled off at several venue.

More information is available on the Majestic Theatre website.
item.name: Open Doors Manchester Arts and Cultural Tour
